law.catch_line: Expense of keeping and dieting prisoner transferred to penitentiary or reformatory -- Who pays.

text.section: The expense of keeping and dieting a prisoner transferred to the penitentiary or reformatory pursuant to KRS 441.540 shall be borne by the unit of government.
The unit of government shall pay the expenses directly to the Department of Corrections.
"Expenses" shall mean the fee set by the Department of Corrections.

law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 127, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 42, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 5, effective January 1, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2240a-2.
